name: Lark Rise Farm Walks (Route 1 - Green Markers)

ai.summary: Lark Rise Farm Walks (Route 1 - Green Markers) is a short, easy 3.1 km rural walk in the UK, suitable for families and casual walkers seeking a gentle outdoor stroll.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat to gently rolling farm lanes and grassy footpaths. Expect a mix of compact earth, gravel, and potential mud after rain. Some gates or stiles may be encountered.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked paths and respect farm property. Be mindful of traffic on country lanes. Keep dogs under control or on a lead where required. Wear sturdy footwear and check weather conditions. Carry a map or cue sheet and ensure your phone is charged for emergencies.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or light boots
Weather-appropriate clothing (layers, waterproof if rain is likely)
Cap or sunhat and sunscreen for sunny days
Map, cue sheet, or GPS device
ai.best_seasons: All year, with best conditions from spring through autumn; winter visits may be muddy and daylight is shorter.

seo.title: Lark Rise Farm Walks Route 1 (Green Markers) - 3.1 km Easy UK Walk
seo.meta_description: Discover Lark Rise Farm Walks Route 1, a short 3.1 km easy hike in the UK. Gentle terrain, rural scenery, and family-friendly routing on Green Markers.
